item.title: [HBASE-14704] Block cache instances should be mapped to each region servers in standalone mode or HBaseTestingUtility
item.description: CacheConfig has a single and static block cache instance. When HBase is running in standalone mode or HBaseTestingUtility, a single instance of block cache causes incorrect cache stats. So I suggest to change a single instance of block cache to a map of region server and block cache.
item.summary: Block cache instances should be mapped to each region servers in standalone mode or HBaseTestingUtility

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
